title: Chalcolestes
description: **_Chalcolestes_** is a small genus of damselfly in the family Lestidae. They are commonly known as **Willow Spreadwings**. They are similar to the Spreadwings of the genus *Lestes*. The name *Chalcolestes* comes from Greek: χαλχοσ *copper* and ληστησ *predator*. The genus contains only two species.
